hero.title: ZenQR - SaaS QR code platform
hero.description: QR code platform with customization, real-time metrics, and integrations for events and payments.

overview.label: Overview
overview.title: SaaS platform for dynamic QR code management with analytics
overview.paragraph: ZenQR was built to turn QR codes into a <accent>business tool</accent>: <accent>customizable</accent>, <accent>measurable</accent>, and manageable from a single panel. It connects physical experiences (menus, packaging, posters) with digital actions and <accent>real-time analytics</accent>.

challenge.label: Challenge
challenge.title: The challenge
challenge.intro: The client wanted to go far beyond generating basic codes; they were looking for:
challenge.list2: Support for different types of information
challenge.afterList: All with a <accent>clear</accent>, <accent>fluid</accent>, and <accent>modern</accent> visual experience.
challenge.closing: Furthermore, the underlying challenge was to transform the physical into <accent>measurable and real-time editable digital</accent>.

solution.label: Solution
solution.title: The solution
solution.paragraph1: The approach included <accent>thoroughly analyzing</accent> existing tools to identify opportunities and build a roadmap aligned with real needs.
solution.paragraph2: We then developed a platform with a <accent>minimalist</accent> interface that allows users to start creating codes <accent>without even signing up</accent> and with direct navigation.
solution.list1: Support for different types of content
solution.list2: Customization with colors, logos, and templates
solution.list5: Integration with external tools for events and payments

results.label: Results
results.title: Results
results.paragraph: The result was an <accent>efficient and easy-to-use</accent> platform, built in <accent>close collaboration</accent> with the client to validate, adjust, and deliver a product with clarity, functionality, and design, ready to operate as a <accent>competitive alternative</accent> in its market.

cta.subtitle: Custom development
cta.description: If you're building a digital product and need it to be clear for the user and scalable for the business, we can help you develop it to your needs.

whyVado.description: We integrate with your way of working so you get results without complications. From understanding your needs, implementing them, and providing support. When we're done, the code belongs to you, giving you full control over your solution.
whyVado.sub1Description: We constantly evolve our tools and processes to offer you functional, secure, and future-ready technology solutions.
whyVado.sub2Description: We are your strategic partner to turn ideas into real results. Our commitment is clear: quality at every step and solutions that grow your business.

faq.label: GOT QUESTIONS?
faq.description: We offer staff augmentation solutions designed for your unique needs.

q1.question: What types of solutions does Vado offer?
q1.answer: We offer custom software development, AI solutions, and staff augmentation with specialized talent.

q2.question: How do you work with clients?
q2.answer: We integrate with your way of working: we understand your needs, implement the solution, and provide ongoing support. When we're done, the code belongs to you.

q3.question: What technologies are you specialized in?
q3.answer: We work with a modern, scalable stack: React, Node.js, Python, cloud (AWS, GCP), and AI tools, adapting to each project.

q4.question: Do you offer support after the project?
q4.answer: Yes. We offer ongoing support, maintenance, and evolution of solutions so they continue to grow with your business.

q5.question: How can I start a project with Vado?
q5.answer: Contact us through our contact page. We'll discuss your needs, define scope, and propose the next steps.

q6.question: Do you work with companies outside my country?
q6.answer: Yes. We work with clients in different regions, with clear communication and schedules that adapt for effective collaboration.

hero.tagline: Hire the best remote talent from Latin America and strengthen your team to achieve greater milestones.

intro.label: STAFF AUGMENTATION
intro.description: Staff augmentation is a flexible strategy that allows you to add specialized talent to your projects without hiring internally. We adapt the profile to the requirements and objectives of your project.

step1.title: Careful Review
step1.description: We analyze each profile in detail to find the ideal candidates for each project.

step2.title: Skills Test
step2.description: We evaluate knowledge and technical skills to ensure that each person adds value from day one.

step3.title: Cultural Fit
step3.description: We conduct in-depth interviews to confirm they share our values and fit with each client's way of working.

step4.title: Guided Integration
step4.description: Once approved, the new talent joins your team efficiently and with Vado's support at all times.

whyVado.description: We focus on finding the right profile and integrating it into your team.
whyVado.descriptionPart2: We look for talent with proven experience and skills aligned with your project.
whyVado.sub1Description: We adapt to your way of working without interfering with your operation or delaying your processes.
whyVado.sub2Description: We monitor the performance of assigned talent and stay in contact to adjust whatever is necessary.
